    A Builder to construct CreateDirectoryRequests.

    A Directory is a top-level container of Accounts and Groups.

    An Directory-specific Criteria class, enabling a Directory-specific fluentquery DSL.

    Directory-specific options that may be specified when retrieving Directory resources.
    DirectoryStatus 
    PasswordPolicy
    A PasswordPolicy resource is used to configure different aspects of the restrictions on passwords for accounts associated with the parent Directory.
    PasswordStrength
    PasswordStrength is the resource used to configure the password strength policy.
